system.description:
At 7th level when you prepare and administer one of the following medicinals, apply the following effects instead of the normal ones.

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.pn2up6538kaog0ys]{Adderwort Roots}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.vzy6r3gv8ylwoim7]{Antitoxin}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.1wsowojgg8hcd5wi]{Dried Yewclaw Bark}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.ktsrqn3m6ifjry80]{Fairy Cap}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.ufyph3rlho818mv2]{Ironwood Acorn}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.cd4i6cm0e8y35iso]{Pressed Spiderbulb}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.hkqclpp7pmjyi98l]{Sycamore Petal Poultice}: These all last 8 hours instead of 1.

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.067o6hjosd8nrjs8]{Healer's Satchel}: You can make a DC 15 Medicine check when expending a use of the satchel as an action on a dying creature. On a success, you do not expend a use of the satchel.

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.9fwa5w3750ckh4ln]{Jar of Leeches}: When administered by you, the creature may roll hit dice to recover hit points over the short rest up to a maximum number of hit dice equal to half your proficiency bonus.

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.x9t8xc1kffdnm5nz]{Laudanum}: You may administer it once per target's short rest unless the target gains a mental stress effect, in which case you may not do so again until the target finishes a long rest. Each subsequent dose beyond the first in a day causes a short term mental stress effect on a roll of 1 or 2 on a d10.

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.jpdzbf6ave90ugpq]{Medicinal Salve}: The bonus hit die is a maximum even without a bandage. When administered with a bandage the patient may also re-roll another hit die and take the better result.
